name: Bounty Hunter
description: In the game, you are a bounty hunter, and your daily job is to take on all kinds of monster hunting tasks to earn commissions. Now the northern town of SnowField has been attacked by wolves. Many bounty hunters have been there and no return, and you have also received an invitation from the mayor.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 4 GB available space
